content.rendered:
The Campus Center accepts both Federal Work Study and Non-Federal Work Study applications, and we do not require and previous work experience. If you have any questions about working here, please contact us at (909) 448-4910.

Apply for Campus Center Jobs

Campus Center jobs are listed here; please make sure “Abraham Campus Center” is entered in the keyword and click Search. Results will appear on-screen.

If you received Federal Work Study in your financial aid letter, please apply for the Federal Work Study position. If you do not have Federal Work Study, please apply for Non-Federal Work Study.

Each position contains a position description, specific duties, minimum qualifications, and more. Please review the job and make sure you meet the requirements before applying. Click Apply for this Job to submit your application. You will then be asked to create a login for the system; if you’ve already created one, enter your username and password now. If not, you make create an account with Chronicle Vitae or use your LinkedIn account to proceed.
